author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...RAINBANDS FROM CHANTAL MOVING OVER THE CAROLINA COAST...
summary: ...RAINBANDS FROM CHANTAL MOVING OVER THE CAROLINA COAST... As of 8:00 PM EDT Sat Jul 05 the center of Chantal was located near 32.3, -78.7 with movement N at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...RAINBANDS FROM CHANTAL MOVING OVER THE CAROLINA COAST... As of 8:00 PM EDT Sat Jul 05 the center of Chantal was located near 32.3, -78.7 with movement N at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Chantal (AT3/AL032025)
